# observe_app

Installs an Observe App. Each app can only be installed once per workspace.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `folder` (String)
- `module_id` (String)

### Optional

- `variables` (Map of String)
- `version` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
- `oid` (String)
- `outputs` (String)
